code:
%%{HealthTech_EMR_Sync}}}%%

stateDiagram-v2
title: SM-06.02 — Project Lifecycle (HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault)

[HealthTech_LabAnalyzer] --> PLANNED : ProjectCreated (HealthTech_EMR_Sync)
note right of PLANNED
  Project registered in local hub context  
  • proposal approved via Governance (HealthTech_LabAnalyzer)  
  • hub assigns steward and metadata  
  • initial budget & milestones defined
end note

PLANNED --> ACTIVE : MilestoneStarted
note right of ACTIVE
  Work phase begins  
  • contributions logged in PoC (HealthTech_LabAnalyzer)  
  • funding stream initiated via Treasury (HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault)  
  • progress tracked in Metrics (HealthTech_EMR_Sync)
end note

ACTIVE --> REVIEW : MilestoneReported (HealthTech_LabAnalyzer)
note right of REVIEW
  Evaluate milestone completion:  
  • quantitative (HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine)  
  • qualitative (HealthTech_LabAnalyzer)  
  • peer validation or ethics guard review
end note

REVIEW --> APPROVED : MilestoneApproved (HealthTech_EMR_Sync)
REVIEW --> REJECTED : MilestoneRejected
REJECTED --> ACTIVE : ReworkSubmitted
APPROVED --> NEXT_PHASE : NextMilestonePlanned
NEXT_PHASE --> ACTIVE : PhaseStarted

APPROVED --> COMPLETED : AllMilestonesDone (HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault)
note right of COMPLETED
  Project closed successfully  
  • Treasury marks payout complete  
  • final SRI contribution logged
end note

COMPLETED --> [HealthTech_LabAnalyzer]

%% ---- Exceptional paths ----
ACTIVE --> PAUSED : ResourceShortage / GovernanceHold
PAUSED --> ACTIVE : ResumeAuthorized
PAUSED --> CANCELLED : CancelledByGovernance
CANCELLED --> [HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine] : ProjectTerminated (HealthTech_PatientRecords)

%% ---- Maintenance / metrics sync ----
ACTIVE --> SYNC : SyncToFederation
SYNC --> ACTIVE : SyncComplete

%% ===== Styling =====
classDef core fill:#ff8b00,stroke:#333,color:#fff,font-weight:bold;
class PLANNED,ACTIVE,REVIEW,APPROVED,NEXT_PHASE,COMPLETED,PAUSED,CANCELLED,REJECTED,SYNC core;
repo_description: The cohersphere architecture — structural blueprint of the resonance network. Defines the modular layers connecting app, API, and governance protocols. Outlines data flows for Proof-of-Contribution, c
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
